hadiths.text: It was narrated from abu Bakrah that the Prophet said; 'None of you should say:'I fasted Ramadan' or 'I prayed Qiyam throughout the whole month."' I do not know whether he dislike self-praise or he said: "Inevitably there will be heedlessness and sleep." (Da 'if)

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي أَنْ يُقَالَ لِشَهْرِ رَمَضَانَ رَمَضَانُ
chapter.eng-name: Concession Allowing The Month Of Ramadan To Be Called (Merely) Ramadan
